tweet: Litecoin Core 0.18.1 final release is out! Who says Litecoin has no development? 😀  Many thanks to all the developers that worked on this release! 👏  We are already hard at work on the next release, Litecoin Core 0.20, which will bring us in line with the latest Bitcoin Core.

Litecoin Core 0.18.1 final release is out! Who says Litecoin has no development? 😀  Many thanks to all the developers that worked on this release! 👏  We are already hard at work on the next release, Litecoin Core 0.20, which will bring us in line with the latest Bitcoin Core.

Family caregiver restrictions in #LTC have now lasted for 90 days.  Why is this called “short-term” when the average life expectancy in an Ontario LTC is 18 months? Who is making these decisions for people without their consent & open discussion of the harms?  #COVID19 #onpoli

7 non-negotiable things to prevent a second wave of LTC deaths:  https://t.co/C4YaSawTUl  1. Approved outbreak plans 2. Inspections by PHUs 3. PPE and testing 4. FT pay and benefits for workers 5. 1-site work policy 6. Capacity to isolate and cohort 7. Measures to allow visitation  https://t.co/Sc1imSQDtc
Premier Ford says "no, we didn't fail" in long-term care.   He says the province threw everything at the situation in LTC and says a similar situation played out across the world.  #onpoli #onLTC

#Litecoin .20 core release is scheduled next, with a soft fork for better smart contract capability through @JeremyRubin's CheckTemplateVerify (CTV)  After that, the addition of extension blocks & #Mimblewimble from dev @DavidBurkett38   #LTC continues to move forward & improve!

The MN Department of Health reports 19 new COVID-19 deaths, including 16 in long-term care (84%). Overall, 984 of 1236 were in LTC (80%). The number in ICU is 193, the lowest since May 7. The total number hospitalized is 234, the lowest since May 4.

So we can accommodate the NHL but can't:  -ensure care partners can see their relatives/friends in-person in LTC or hospital settings; -mobilize childcare/youth supports for kids 12 and over;  -get basic cleaning & sanitary supports for public housing.  Got it.#bcpoli #priorities
